mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime )values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select: select t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, c.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, a.name as activityId, c1.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId=c.id left join tbl_contacts c1 on t.contactsId=c1.id left join tbl_activity a on t.activityId=a.id where t.id=#{id}
select stage as name,count(*) as value from tbl_tran group by stage
select max(t.cnt) from (select count(*) as cnt from tbl_tran group by stage) t

select count(*) from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer cu on t.customerId = cu.id join tbl_contacts co on t.contactsId = co.id join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and cu.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and co.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'

select t.id, t.name, cu.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, u.name as owner, t.source, co.fullname as contactsId from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer cu on t.customerId = cu.id join tbl_contacts co on t.contactsId = co.id join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and cu.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and co.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'
limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}
